forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 61F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 51F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low around 50F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
